KekiNu

Full name:
Seo Jun Ho
Native name:
서준호
Birthday:
Aug 28, 1990
Age:
34 years old
Group (2020-present):
KAVE

Introduction

Kekinu is the energetic drummer of the Korean band KAVE and a current member of the co-ed band Binary Number. His powerful drumming style and rhythmic precision bring a strong backbone to KAVE’s music, adding depth and energy to every track. Kekinu’s skillful performance is central to KAVE’s sound, and his dynamic presence in both live shows and studio recordings showcases his versatility as a musician. His involvement with Binary Number further highlights his adaptability, contributing to his growth as a well-rounded artist.
